channel.title: [317]delta based- error on shop interface, 100+ of an item and it shows 0 of it
channel.description:
say i put dragon claws in shop and i put 100 of them in there, it will show that there is 100 of them, but lets say i put 10000 dragon claws in shop, it will say that there is 0 dragon claws in shop but really there is 10000 of them and still sells them.
is there anyway of fixing this?

item.title: [317]delta based- error on shop interface, 100+ of an item and it shows 0 of it
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

your probably using one of demises sources, he messed something up so that it does that on purpose or on accident idk try looking for a different base if its killing you.

Read full topic
